name: Motor Hit Hunter - Racing Sport 3D
description:
Motor Hit Hunter - Racing Sport 3D, an ultimate 3D simulator game to shoot bike rival gangsters and thugs armored cars on fast motos highway.

Motor Hit Hunter - Racing Sport 3DFeatures:


-4 fastest armored heavy bikes with automatic weapons, guns unlimited ammo
-10 extreme killer and challenging shooting missions
-Realistic bullet fire effects and furious sounds
-Awesome urban areas and treacherous tracks and hilly ramps
-Smooth on-screen steer and fire control
